b'Hi everyone!

I\xe2\x80\x99ve actually tried several different ways to begin this post and they seemed either suspicious or weird or meaningless: to write about myself and the partner I want in life is even harder than I thought! Please bear with me a little.

Better-to-know-at-first facts:

I smoke and I\xe2\x80\x99m not proud of it, but well it\xe2\x80\x99s hard to change and I don\xe2\x80\x99t see any good reason to, not yet.

I have a long history of mental issues, mostly eating disorder and depression, got the bipolar diagnosis once but I think the doctor was mistaken. I won\xe2\x80\x99t say that I\xe2\x80\x99ve outgrown that history, but I\xe2\x80\x99m indeed getting stronger, why, I\xe2\x80\x99m writing an ad looking for partner now, you bet I want some good things in life.

I\xe2\x80\x99m not religious, but definitely not atheist. I\xe2\x80\x99m very interested in religions (especially Buddhism) and spiritual practices.

I\xe2\x80\x99m currently learning German, at first it\xe2\x80\x99s because I wanted to go for the vocational training in Germany, but I\xe2\x80\x99ve been told that it\xe2\x80\x99s not such a good idea. I began by reading Kafka\xe2\x80\x99s Ein Landarzt, which has been my favorite for years, then I ventured to read Also sprach Zarathustra which was such a pleasure at first, until Zarathustra spoke of going to women with a whip. Why, if Nietzsche had the fame of the great misogynist like Schopenhauer did, I won\xe2\x80\x99t be as much disappointed, but most people only know him as the mad guy crying for a dead horse which makes his profile kind of loving. I actually cried like a broken hearted lover, why Zarathustra why, I love your teachings so much and you only want to whip me??? My recent reading is Das Ich und das Es, it\xe2\x80\x99s such a shame that the I and the it should be translated into the ego and the id which complicated everything.

(please ignore those nosense above) I\xe2\x80\x99m interested in psychoanalysis, literature (as I\xe2\x80\x99m a student of literature), language learning and philosophy, those are my \xe2\x80\x9cfancy\xe2\x80\x9d hobbies.

My \xe2\x80\x9cnot so fancy\xe2\x80\x9d hobbies are thrillers, horror stories, true crimes, basically anything that gives you a chill on the spine, or a turn in the guts. I\xe2\x80\x99m kind of a daredevil at times (which means when I\xe2\x80\x99m not too lazy to move), and enjoy doing dangerous or unusual things just for the fun of it. I went to visit the cemetery at night because I couldn\xe2\x80\x99t sleep, made a ladder myself from shelves and chair to climb into my dorm window on the second floor when I didn\xe2\x80\x99t have keys, and I can ride a bike with hands off! I\xe2\x80\x99m not sure which city I\xe2\x80\x99m going to be in after I graduate, hopefully I find a job in Europe, hopefully.

What I\xe2\x80\x99m looking for is some serious, long-term relationship. I know you can\xe2\x80\x99t push such things and serious commitments are intimidating, but I speak of the ideal case scenario, and maybe in a very long time. But really, social with people even people you like is exhausting. I don\xe2\x80\x99t know if the metaphor is inappropriate but my want for long committed relationship is kind of like choosing good tv series (once chosen you get to watch for months even years) over good films, I want company and I don\xe2\x80\x99t like the trying and choosing period, I want to find someone and stick to the choice.

Well I can\xe2\x80\x99t really say what I expect in you\xe2\x80\xa6 basically anyone who\xe2\x80\x99s still reading here, and is interested, or have any further questions, please feel free to contact me.'
